SubSections.Title: Move Silently
SubSections.Content: Walk, run, or climb without making detectable noise.

SubSections.Title: Shadow A Target
SubSections.Content: Follow someone without being noticed.

SubSections.Title: Slip Through Gaps
SubSections.Content: Maneuver through tight spaces like vents, fences, or narrow alleyways without slowing down.

SubSections.Title: Controlled Breathing
SubSections.Content: Regulate breath to stay silent in tense situations.

SubSections.Title: Step Lightly
SubSections.Content: Move across fragile or noisy surfaces without making a sound or leaving behind any footprints.

SubSections.Title: Hide Object
SubSections.Content: Stash weapons, data drives, or contraband where they won’t be found.

SubSections.Title: Disguise Appearance
SubSections.Content: Alter your physical features to appear as someone else.

SubSections.Title: Forge Documents
SubSections.Content: Create fake IDs, travel papers, or official credentials.

SubSections.Title: Camouflage
SubSections.Content: Use clothing, makeup, or environmental factors to blend into surroundings.

SubSections.Title: Stash Belongings
SubSections.Content: Hide items on your person or in an area where they are unlikely to be found.

SubSections.Title: Blend Into Shadows
SubSections.Content: Utilize darkness and contrast to remain obscured in low-light environments.

SubSections.Title: Pick Lock
SubSections.Content: Bypass basic locks using tools or improvised methods.

SubSections.Title: Disable Trap
SubSections.Content: Shut down simple mechanical, electrical, or magical traps, security systems or alarms without triggering them.

SubSections.Title: Bypass Sensors
SubSections.Content: Avoid triggering motion detectors, pressure plates, or infrared scanners.

SubSections.Title: Find Hidden Route
SubSections.Content: Find hidden routes into otherwise locked down buildings or areas.

SubSections.Title: Silent Entry
SubSections.Content: Open doors, windows, or vents, or otherwise use mechanical contraptions without making noise.

SubSections.Title: Impersonate Personnel
SubSections.Content: Successfully wear uniforms or use mannerisms to imitate authorized individuals.

SubSections.Title: Vanishing Act
SubSections.Content: Slip away unnoticed from conversations, gatherings, or pursuers.

SubSections.Title: Predict Patrols
SubSections.Content: Recognize the movement patterns of guards and surveillance to avoid detection.

SubSections.Title: Stay Motionless
SubSections.Content: Remain perfectly still in a hiding spot even when being searched for.

SubSections.Title: Setup Distraction
SubSections.Content: Throw or place an out of place object to divert attention away from yourself.

SubSections.Title: Find Hiding Spot
SubSections.Content: Quickly identify hard to find hiding spots.

SubSections.Title: Blend Into Crowd
SubSections.Content: Act unnoticed in populated areas to avoid detection.

SubSections.Title: Act In Place
SubSections.Content: Talk your way past low-ranking security by acting like you belong.

SubSections.Title: Bribe
SubSections.Content: Offer money or favors to persuade someone to cooperate.

SubSections.Title: Lie Convincingly
SubSections.Content: Deceive someone without them realizing.

SubSections.Title: Exaggerate Emotion
SubSections.Content: Enhance your emotional display to persuade or manipulate others.

SubSections.Title: Inspire Action
SubSections.Content: Convince someone to overcome hesitation and commit to a cause or action.

SubSections.Title: Defuse Hostility
SubSections.Content: Cool tempers and ease aggression in tense confrontations.

SubSections.Title: Extract Secret
SubSections.Content: Manipulate, coerce, or deceive someone into revealing information.

SubSections.Title: Read Intentions
SubSections.Content: Determine if someone is being dishonest or withholding something.

SubSections.Title: Pressure Weakness
SubSections.Content: Identify someone’s vulnerabilities to use against them in questioning.

SubSections.Title: Break Loyalty
SubSections.Content: Convince someone to betray their employer or faction.

SubSections.Title: Implant Doubt
SubSections.Content: Subtly introduce uncertainty in someone's beliefs, memories, or loyalty, by cleverly shaping their own beliefs against them.

SubSections.Title: Detect Discomfort
SubSections.Content: Notice small signs that suggest nervousness, dishonesty, or internal conflicts.

SubSections.Title: Fake Emotion
SubSections.Content: Convincingly display any chosen emotional response.

SubSections.Title: Plant False Evidence
SubSections.Content: Secretly place incriminating objects to mislead investigations.

SubSections.Title: Feign Ignorance
SubSections.Content: Convincingly act as though you know nothing about a subject or event.

SubSections.Title: Misdirection
SubSections.Content: Distract someone’s attention away from where it should be.

SubSections.Title: Invoke Sympathy
SubSections.Content: Pretend to be physically or mentally wounded or unwell to gain sympathy or lower someone’s guard.

SubSections.Title: Personal Bond
SubSections.Content: Quickly establish rapport or gain trust through by highlighting or feigning emotional understanding.

SubSections.Title: Adopt Persona
SubSections.Content: Assume the identity of someone else through mannerisms, speech, and behavior.

SubSections.Title: Mimic Voice
SubSections.Content: Accurately imitate another person’s tone or speech patterns.

SubSections.Title: Disguise Identity
SubSections.Content: Adjust clothing, posture, and accessories to fully blend into a different role.

SubSections.Title: Convincing Alibi
SubSections.Content: Create and maintain a believable false story to escape suspicion, or fabricate a background that withstands light scrutiny.

SubSections.Title: Feign Status
SubSections.Content: Act like someone of a higher or lower social class, or even of another culture, to manipulate expectations.

SubSections.Title: Forge Handwriting
SubSections.Content: Replicate handwriting or signatures to falsify documents or messages.

SubSections.Title: Command Presence
SubSections.Content: Speak and act with authority to make others follow your lead.

SubSections.Title: Flatter
SubSections.Content: Boost someone's ego to make them more agreeable.

SubSections.Title: Control Conversation
SubSections.Content: Subtly steer discussions in the direction you want.

SubSections.Title: Public Speaking
SubSections.Content: Captivate groups of listeners and deliver compelling arguments or inspiring speeches.

SubSections.Title: Subtle Suggestion
SubSections.Content: Implant ideas into conversations in a way that feels natural rather than forced.

SubSections.Title: Emphasize Urgency
SubSections.Content: Make an issue seem more imminent or important to push someone into action.
